body:
When a woman leaves abuse, all she often leaves with is her life.

The Give Registry is a collection of essential items women need most when they're starting over.

Anyone can help by contributing an item on the registry at any Myer store. All items are donated directly to Salvation Army women's refuges, to pass on to women in need.


For every item our customers give, Myer will give one too.
title: Tag Line

_audio.ariaLabel: This button will play an audio description of the video

_media.ariaLabel: This button will play the video

body:
A moment of your time can make a huge difference to the success of the Myer Give Registry and the lives of the women and children in need.


Many of our customers are keen to get involved when given the chance. Give them this choice by letting them know about the Give Registry and how they can help. Together we can make a real difference to these women's lives.

 

Asking your customers "have you heard of the Give Registry?" popping a leaflet in with their purchases is all it can take.
title: Text Title

body: Click images to find out more.
title: why we care

body:
For every item a customer gives, Myer gives one too - doubling the impact!


We will continue to raise awareness of family violence and partner with our customers to provide essential items to help survivors start over.
title: Text Title

_items.body: Women's and Children's Underwear & Socks

body:
All the items on the registry have been selected by women who have fled abuse and understand first hand which items are most important when starting over.


For each item a customer gives, we give one too. We then deliver all items to The Salvation Army to distribute to women and children in need.


Monetary Donations

Customers can also choose to make monetary donations to the registry instead of purchasing items. All monetary donations go directly to The Salvation Army's Family and Domestic Violence Services.
title: Text Title

_items.title: GIVE REGISTRY LIST
_items.body:
The Give Registry list is available via:

  • Give Registry Leaflet at POS - each POS should have a stack of Give Registry Leaflets that include an overview of how the registry works and a list of items customers can purchase.
  • Myer Connect - on the in-store iPad select the Myer Connect icon and visit 'Find a Registry' (on desktop: MyerConnect > Useful Links > Find a Registry). Registrant Last Name: Registry. Registrant First Name: Give.
  • www.myer.com.au/give - images of items on the registry are shown on our website.


If customers would like to see the items that will be donated in person you can direct them to the appropriate departments e.g. home for the bedding and tabletop. In some stores the items on the registry are tagged to highlight which ones they are.

_items.title: ITEM DONATION
_items.body:
1. Log into POS
  2. Select MORE>>
  3. Select GIVE REGISTRY
  4. Select GIVE ITEM
     Note: using the in-Store iPad obtain the item number for the selected Give Registry item the customer would like to donate. Only items from the Give Registry list can be donated.
  5. Enter the Give Registry item/s
  6. Select ENTER
  7. Select TOTAL
  8. Scan customers Myer One card
  9. Select the customer’s preferred tender type and complete the sale
  10. Hand receipt to the customer along with a Give Registry Receipt Wallet.  Note: POS receipt will need to be neatly folded and placed in the Receipt Wallet.
  11. Do not hand goods to the customer and do not take items to Gift Registry as all items donated with be fulfilled centrally in one location and delivered to The Salvation Army from there.

_items.title: MONETARY DONATION
_items.body:
1. Log into POS 
  2. Select MORE>> 
  3. Select GIVE REGISTRY 
  4. Select GIVE DONATION 
  5. Select the Give Registry donation amount 
  6. Select TOTAL 
  7. Do not scan customers Myer One card as no points are earned with this type of transaction 
  8. Select the customer’s preferred tender type and complete the sale 
  9. Hand the customer receipt to the customer along with a Give Registry Receipt Wallet.  Note: POS receipt will need to be neatly folded and placed in the Receipt Wallet.

_items.title: GIVING A GIFT WITH A DIFFERENCE
_items.body:
Christmas:

During Christmas our customers will be given the option of purchasing from the registry as a Christmas gift for their friends, family or coworkers. A Christmas gift that keeps on giving.


To process these transactions you follow the same steps as you usually would for a Give Registry item or donation, with the difference being you give the customer a Christmas Give Registry Card and Wallet for them to personalise and give to their loved one or colleague to let them know a donation has been made on their behalf.


Keep an eye out for the new visual merchandise displays and Christmas Gift Cards coming soon to your store.


All Year Round Gifting:

Customers can also choose year round to purchase specific items off the Give Registry list or make a donation as a gift on behalf of someone else. 


In this instance you can provide the customer with a gift receipt inserted into a Give Registry Wallet.

_items.title: GIVE REGISTRY LEADERBOARD
_items.body:
All stores are supporting this great initiative. Purchases contribute to your sales and store targets.


See how your store is tracking by visiting:

Myer Connect > Leaderboards & Reports > Operations > Give Registry Leaderboard

body:
You can process Give Registry donations at any POS. Any Myer Team Member who is trained in POS can do it. 


Click on the sections below for detailed instructions on how to complete these transactions.
title: Accordion Title

_incorrect.final:
Not quite


All Myer Team Members who are trained in POS can process Give Registry donations. They can be processed at any POS, in any department, in any store.


Item donations you process count toward your individual and store sales targets.

_feedback.correct:
Correct!


All Myer Team Members who are trained in POS can process Give Registry donations. They can be processed at any POS, in any department, in any store. 


Item donations you process count toward your individual and store sales targets.

_items.text: Gift Registry and Hub Team Members
_items._feedback: Traditionally registries are processed through these teams but this registry is a little different, keep trying!
Nearly there - hint: every POS has a 'Give Registry' option on it...
Exactly! Any Myer Team Member who knows how to use POS can process the sale and it counts towards you and your store's sales targets.

body: Who can process a Give Registry purchase?
title: Who can process sale

_incorrect.final:
Not quite


Customers can choose to either purchase items from the Give Registry list or make monetary donations. 


Each item on the Give Registry has been carefully selected by women who have fled abuse and understand first hand which items are most important when starting over. 


Items are distributed directly to women and children housed in their refuges and supported by their services across the nation. Monetary donations go directly to The Salvation Army's Family and Domestic Violence services.

_feedback.correct:
Correct!


Customers can choose to either purchase items from the Give Registry list or make monetary donations.


Items are distributed directly to women and children housed in their refuges and supported by their services across the nation. 


Monetary donations go directly to The Salvation Army's Family and Domestic Violence services.

_items.text: Any item we stock at Myer as long as it's something they would find useful
_items._feedback: Close but not quite there, give it one more try!

_items.text: Only specific items listed on the Give Registry
_items._feedback: Almost there, just one more thing...

_items.text: Items listed on the Give Registry list or monetary donations
_items._feedback: Spot on! Both the items purchased and monetary donations go to The Salvation Army to distribute to survivors of Domestic Abuse. Items go direct to women and children in their crisis centres and refuges, monetary donations support The Salvation Army's Family and Domestic Violence Services.

body: What can customers donate to the Give Registry?
title: MCQ Title

_incorrect.final:
Not quite


All items purchased (plus those Myer give) are picked and packed centrally and sent to The Salvation Army in each capital city. They then distribute them directly to women and children housed in their refuges and supported by their services across the nation.

_feedback.correct:
Correct!


All items purchased (plus those Myer give) are picked and packed centrally and sent to The Salvation Army in each capital city. They then distribute them directly to women and children housed in their refuges and supported by their services across the nation.

_items.text: They are picked and packed centrally and delivered to The Salvation Army to distribute
_items._feedback:
Great memory! 

All items our customers purchase, as well as the items we donate (our pledge to match one-for-one), are fulfilled centrally and delivered to The Salvation Army in each major city to distribute to their crisis centres and refuges nationally.

_items.text: After they purchase the item in-store you transfer it to the Gift Registry team to wrap, pack and deliver to The Salvation Army.
_items._feedback:
One more try?

We are doing things a little differently with this registry as we are looking to partner with our customers to provide thousands of items to those in need.

_items.text: They are either picked, packed and sent centrally or customers can choose to drop them off at the shelter themselves.
_items._feedback:
You're half right! 
The Salvation Army supports over 2000 women a year through crisis centres and refuges across the nation. Ensuring they get distributed to all those in need is a priority. Willing to give it another try as you're very close...

body: How do the donations get to the women and children in need?
title: How are items delivered to the women in need?

_feedback.correct:
Correct!


The Give Registry is an on-going program, running for a minimum of 2 years.

_incorrect.final:
Not quite 


The Give Registry is an on-going program, running for a minimum of 2 years.

_items._feedback:
Not quite. 


We are committed to supporting the Give Registry program
_items.text: Until all items on the registry have been purchased

_items._feedback: Getting close, one more try!
_items.text: Until the end of the financial year
An ongoing program, running for a minimum of 2 years.
_items._feedback:
Correct.

We are in this for the long run as we feel that together we can make a real difference to the women and children fleeing abuse.

body: How long is the Give Registry program running for?
title: MCQ Title

body:
Talk to your manager about the Give Registry and how you and the team can support it. 


Visit the Give Registry website by clicking on the button below.
